level.text: If prices are fixed by law or regulation; or

It can be clearly demonstrated from the existence of full and open competition or prior cost experience with the goods or services that acceptance of the most advantageous initial proposal without discussion would result in a fair and reasonable price.
If discussions are not held pursuant to ยง 1633.1(b), the contracting officer may elect to award the contract to the highest ranked offeror, provided that:
All offerors have been notified of the possibility that an award might be made without discussions; and
The terms of the contract are within the scope of the RFP; and
The award must be made without any written or oral discussions with any offeror.
